md:
giải nghĩa từ "ction" sang tiếng việt; đưa ra nghĩa tiếng việt theo từ loại và đưa ra câu ví dụ, các từ liên quan.

1. Action (n) - Hành động
	* Meaning: The process of doing something to achieve a purpose.
	* Example: The action of the movie was so exciting.
	* Related words: reaction, interaction, transaction
2. Action (v) - Thực hiện
	* Meaning: To take action in order to achieve something.
	* Example: We need to action this plan immediately.
	* Related words: activate, react, interact
3. Actionable (adj) - Có thể thực hiện được
	* Meaning: Able to be taken or used as a basis for further action.
	* Example: The information was actionable and led to a successful investigation.
	* Related words: active, reactive, proactive
4. Action-packed (adj) - Đầy ắp hành động
	* Meaning: Full of exciting and fast-paced events.
	* Example: The action-packed movie kept me on the edge of my seat.
	* Related words: action, adventure, thriller

Note: The meanings and examples provided are just a few among many possible interpretations and uses of the word "action".
html:
giải nghĩa từ "ction" sang tiếng việt; đưa ra nghĩa tiếng việt theo từ loại và đưa ra câu ví dụ, các từ liên quan.

  1. Action (n) - Hành động
    • Meaning: The process of doing something to achieve a purpose.
    • Example: The action of the movie was so exciting.
    • Related words: reaction, interaction, transaction
  2. Action (v) - Thực hiện
    • Meaning: To take action in order to achieve something.
    • Example: We need to action this plan immediately.
    • Related words: activate, react, interact
  3. Actionable (adj) - Có thể thực hiện được
    • Meaning: Able to be taken or used as a basis for further action.
    • Example: The information was actionable and led to a successful investigation.
    • Related words: active, reactive, proactive
  4. Action-packed (adj) - Đầy ắp hành động
    • Meaning: Full of exciting and fast-paced events.
    • Example: The action-packed movie kept me on the edge of my seat.
    • Related words: action, adventure, thriller

Note: The meanings and examples provided are just a few among many possible interpretations and uses of the word "action".
